creditline: Gift of David and Ruth Waterbury in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: two vertical ribbed rectangular structures with slanted cutouts at one front left corner of each; triangular cutout element spanning columns at top with linear curved grid design on copper wire at center of triangle; arcing element cut out of columns below triangle; rectangular base; medium and dark wood patinas and black triangular element
title: Tower Series III
